name: Colorsseum (MT-Pad Dev)
description:
Colorsseum

[Created for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam]

Please consider playing the full version (we happened to submit a wrong build) :(

The Full Version:

https://mt-pad.itch.io/colorsseum-full-version

Gameplay

Clear the Challenges of the Colosseum using the arrows the match the enemies color, learn new combinations of skills in your run to help you defeat the final boss!

Controls

There is a tutorial in the game explaining the controls.
